amendment.description: To provide an assured stream of funding for veteran's health care that will take into account the annual changes in the veteran's population and inflation to be paid for by restoring the pre-2001 top rate for income over $1 million, closing corporate tax loopholes and delaying tax cuts for the wealthy.

action.text: Amendment SA 3141 proposed by Senator Stabenow.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3141 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 63.
